before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"128hl","text":"The Lysis Buffer contains an integrated pH indicator to easily","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8edpq","text":"control the optimal pH value for DNA binding. Efficient DNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nl2b","text":"binding (for Column loading) requires a pH lower than 7.5 that is","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ev8q5","text":"indicated by a color change of the indicator to bright yellow.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79f62","text":"The kit can either be used in micro-centrifuges or on vacuum","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ccb24","text":"manifolds. It enables the extraction of plasmid DNA up to 10 kb","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a07j8","text":"length and yields up to 20 μg DNA per preparation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4e4sa","text":"The eluted high-quality plasmid DNA is ready to use for a variety","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dieao","text":"of down-stream application. For subsequent in vitro translation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gqks","text":"we recommend to add RNase Inhibitor or the application of an","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfq79","text":"additional spin-column or phenol-chloroform based purification","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8v386","text":"step. This avoids any risk of carry-over contamination with RNase","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7squp","text":"due to the previous neutralization step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dv1r3","text":"Preparation Procedure:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18ag3","text":"The DNA purification follows a simple binding, washing, and","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7s6cb","text":"eluting procedure. The optional secondary washing step","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd8t2","text":"minimizes the salt content of the purification product. Before","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jvm","text":"starting, add the following components to the respective bottles:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48t94","text":"ŸAdd the RNase A to the Neutralization Buffer and mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hq79","text":"Neutralization Buffer containing RNase A should be stored","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2sq54","text":"at 4 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"701j9","text":"ŸThe activity of dissolved RNase A in Neutralization Buffer may","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1uer","text":"decrease after several months and small amounts of RNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10s1","text":"may be co-purified. In case RNA is detected after plasmid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8785s","text":"purification, add additional RNase A to the Neutralization","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o1a4","text":"Buffer in order to enhance enzyme activities.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95j7m","text":"ŸAdd 96-99 % Ethanol (not included in the kit) to the Washing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26fj5","text":"Buffer as indicated on the bottle. Please note that the Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"filiu","text":"concentration of Washing Buffer may decrease during long","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3up9i","text":"term storage resulting in a drop-down of the final DNA yield.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9rehc","text":"Description:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fufou","text":"Fast-n-Easy Plasmid Mini-Prep Kit is designed for isolation of","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1numa","text":"high-purity plasmid or cosmid DNA from bacterial cells for","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51lt4","text":"subsequent amplification, sequencing, restriction digests or","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhqqd","text":"transformations. The 2-step alkaline lysis procedure and binding","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5l676","text":"column based preparation provide a fast, easy and efficient way","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vcib","text":"of DNA isolation without shearing or significant loss of product. It","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpsjk","text":"allows elution in a small volume of low-salt buffer. Time-","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3ban","text":"consumingphenol-chloroformextractionoralcohol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ui8t","text":"precipitation is not required.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

The cleaved gDNA affects the plasmid DNA preparation step and can be isolated together with the plasmid DNA. This reduces the efficiency of plasmid DNA prep. For this reason, mix only by the inverting method after adding Buffer S1.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
